#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define PUTCHAR putchar_unlocked
#define R register
#define GC getchar()
#define ULL unsigned long long int
const ULL SQRT_MAX = 1ULL << 32;
void Fast(long long int &x) // Fast in
{
    R ULL a=GC;
    x=0;
    for(;(a<48 || a>57);a=GC);
    for(;(a>47 && a<58);a=GC)
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+a-48;
}
inline void write(long long int x) // Fast Out
{
    if(x==-1)
    {
        PUTCHAR('-');
        PUTCHAR('1');
        PUTCHAR('\n');
    }
    else
    {
        ULL i = 10;
        char buf[11];
        buf[10] = '\n';
    do
      {
            buf[--i] = x % 10 + '0';
            x/= 10;
      }
      while(x);
    do
      {
          PUTCHAR(buf[i]);
      } while (buf[i++] != '\n');
    }
}

int main()
{
	long long int t,*d,i;
	d=(long long int *)malloc(1000002*sizeof(long long int));
	d[0]=0;
    d[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<=1000001;i++)
    	d[i]=(d[i-1]+d[i-2])%MOD; // dp
	Fast(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int a ,b , r ;
		Fast(a);
		Fast(b);
		Fast(r);
		if(r==1)
		{
			write(a) ;
			continue;
		}
		else if(r==2)
		{
			write(b) ;
			continue;
		}
		write(((a*d[r-2])+(b*d[r-1]))%MOD);
	}
	free(d);
	return 0;
}
